channel.title: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version in Whonix 8!
channel.description:
I got the torbutton blinking for upgrade today but can't upgrade it, got thsi Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (7 characters) Either check.torproject.org has been compromised or this is a Whonix bug.
Possible reasons:
- The download server is down. - Whonix's Tor Browser Updater has been broken due to upstream changes.
Recommendations:
- Try again later. If the error persists it probably won't solve itself before the next Whonix update. - Check Whonix News: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download#Stay_tuned - Manually update: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Manually_Updating_Tor_Browser
i'm with whonix 8.x
should be worried about this?
Edit by Patrick: Changed title.

item.title: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version in Whonix 8!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
No need to be worried.

They changed the location of the version check url:
https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/8940#comment:21

In Whonix 8 your only option is this:

Whonix – 1 May 20

Tor Browser/Manual Download - Whonix

Manually Downloading Tor Browser. Useful in case Tor Browser Downloader (by Whonix ™ developers) is broken.

But since Whonix 8 support will end soon, it’s best to update to Whonix 9.

Read full topic
item.source: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version in Whonix 8!

item.title: Could not find out latest Tor Browser version in Whonix 8!
item.dc:creator: Dani
item.description:
I got the torbutton blinking for upgrade today but can’t upgrade it, got thsi
Could not find out latest Tor Browser version! Excessive version string length. (7 characters)
Either check.torproject.org has been compromised or this is a Whonix bug.

Possible reasons:

  • The download server is down.
  • Whonix’s Tor Browser Updater has been broken due to upstream changes.

Recommendations:

  • Try again later. If the error persists it probably won’t solve itself before the next Whonix update.
  • Check Whonix News: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download#Stay_tuned
  • Manually update: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Manually_Updating_Tor_Browser

i’m with whonix 8.x

should be worried about this?
